changeSet.author: adnan.bhuiyan
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CODETABLEITEM SET DESCRIPTION='15000 Total Income' WHERE TABLENAME='BDMOASCRALineItemType' AND CODE='LIT24' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER='en'; UPDATE CODETABLEITEM SET DESCRIPTION='12010 Taxable Non-Eligible Amount of Dividends' WHERE TABLENAME='BDMOASCRALineItemType' AND CODE='LIT31' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER='en';
changeSet.rollback: UPDATE CODETABLEITEM SET DESCRIPTION='Total-Income' WHERE TABLENAME='BDMOASCRALineItemType' AND CODE='LIT24' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER='en'; UPDATE CODETABLEITEM SET DESCRIPTION='Dvnd-Nelg-Inc-Amt' WHERE TABLENAME='BDMOASCRALineItemType' AND CODE='LIT31' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER='en';
